Package org.springframework.boot.test.autoconfigure.web.servlet

Class MockMvcAutoConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.test.autoconfigure.web.servlet.MockMvcAutoConfiguration
@AutoConfiguration(after={WebMvcAutoConfiguration.class,WebTestClientAutoConfiguration.class}) @ConditionalOnWebApplication(type=SERVLET) @EnableConfigurationProperties({ServerProperties.class,WebMvcProperties.class}) public class MockMvcAutoConfiguration extends Object
Auto-configuration for MockMvc.
Since:
1.4.0
Author:
Phillip Webb, Andy Wilkinson, Stephane Nicoll, Brian Clozel
